title: Let’s Just Leave It at That
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Hey, I’m sure you understand this, but don’t tell anyone about my English make-up class and that I relied on you for it, okay, Kanata.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Okay, okay~. Do you not trust me that much~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I trust you, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Got it. You want to be the cool Karin-senpai in front of everyone after all, right, Karin-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>T-, that’s not what it is! It’s just.... yeah, it’s better not to show the parts where you can’t be a good role model, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufu. Yeah, exactly~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Geez, stop teasing me, Kanata....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Sorry, sorry, it’s just so cute how weak you are when it comes to studying, Karin-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s so rare that it’s funny, right? I get it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Let’s just leave it at that~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
